previewArticle.title: England vs. Italy: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group B Preview

recapArticle.title: England 1, Italy 2: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group D Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Spencer Fornaciari
timelineItems.text: How times have changed. 2006, Italian defense was unbeatable. Now, I have to hold my breath whenever England has the ball. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Ryan Marshall
timelineItems.text: I would of started milner instead of henderson, just so he can track pirlo everywhere!! #WorldCup2014 #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Danny Welbeck (England) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Clarence Watts
timelineItems.text: Amazonia......its a jungle out there! #ENGvITA #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Bryony Cresswell
timelineItems.text: Suddenly, I have become an oracle in the world of football management. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Andy
timelineItems.text: Good to see that, after all the talk, we haven’t got any plan whatsoever for Pirlo. Give him long enough and he’ll kill us. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Raheem Sterling (England).
Marco Verratti (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Matt
timelineItems.text: We're so weak defending our flanks. #eng #engvita #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Jordan Henderson (England) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Claudio Marchisio (Italy).
Glen Johnson (England) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Claudio Marchisio (Italy).

timelineItems.name: Steve Smith
timelineItems.text: England look good going forward, Sterling seeing plenty of the ball and looks threatening #ENGvITA #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Spencer Fornaciari
timelineItems.text: Nice passing on offense by Italy, but a distinct lack of shots on goal so far. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Glen Johnson (England) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Steven Gerrard.

timelineItems.name: Georgie Callé
timelineItems.text: I love that they may be in Brazil but the English fans are shouting far louder than anyone else #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Victoria Boardman
timelineItems.text: The plan with Pirlo is to leave Pirlo, working well!!!! Best passer of the ball in the world! #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Raheem Sterling (England) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marco Verratti (Italy).

timelineItems.name: Rahul Puri
timelineItems.text: Even if they lose today, both these sides will be confident of progressing given #Uruguay's no show today. #EngvIta #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Antonio Candreva (Italy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mario Balotelli.

timelineItems.text: “@bommadog: I'd pay a billion dollars for a #Pirlo only cam screw the rest of this game #ENGvITA #Legend” // +1

timelineItems.name: My Surname is Khan
timelineItems.text: Pirlo is the Liam Neeson of Football. If you make a run, he WILL find you! #EnglandvsItaly #ENGvITA #worldcup #ITA

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, England 1, Italy 2.

timelineItems.text: Not pressing enough without the ball. Pirlo's dummy though �#ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Andrew Latimer
timelineItems.text: MY GOD. That was actually a great goal, and it was scored by England. What's going on?! #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Spencer Fornaciari
timelineItems.text: Great play by England. Horrendous defense by Italy. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Tomas Martin
timelineItems.text: Wowza!! Didn't last long... Rooneys cross was perfect and Sturridges finish was world class!! #FIFAWorldCup #ENGvITA

timelineItems.text: Italy does what it does best. Goes to work for 35 mins then decides to take a nap mid afternoon. Geezus #ENGvITA #FIFA2014

timelineItems.text: Q: Who (after Brazil) has the most attacking Wing Backs in the world? A: Italy So why are we playing with no wingers? #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Kevin Ward
timelineItems.text: Excited now. Think Sterling could establish himself as a world star in this tournament. #ENGvITA #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Julie Tempest

timelineItems.name: Gary Keast

timelineItems.name: Thomas John Galloway

timelineItems.name: ComeOnEngland!
timelineItems.text: Why do I keep hearing talking about humidity? It's been more humid all week in Birmingham than it is now in Manaus. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.text: "The Jordan Henderson scrapbook". A short read. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Two Good Feet
timelineItems.text: Gary Cahill the only player in the starting XI who doesn't play in Manchester or Merseyside. #ENGvITA #WC2014

timelineItems.text: I truly cannot imagine what actual English and Italian fans are going through right now. So intense. #ENGvITA #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tony McGregor
timelineItems.text: England's movement off the ball is non existent, gonna take individual brilliance to snatch a draw here #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Cian McEntee
timelineItems.text: Hmm, England? no chance. #Pirlo #WorldCup2014 #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Steven Gerrard (England) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Offside, Italy. Matteo Darmian tries a through ball, but Ciro Immobile is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Adam J.
timelineItems.text: The English make too much of heat/humidity. Miami, New Orleans, Houston, Dallas all currently warmer and more humid than #Manaus. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Davin Lassiter
timelineItems.text: They shootin'! Aw, made you look #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Cregor Elliott
timelineItems.text: I thought players only got cramp when they were winning #ENGvITA #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Wayne Rooney (England) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Ross Barkley.
Offside, Italy. Marco Parolo tries a through ball, but Ciro Immobile is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: scott millband
timelineItems.text: It won't be a world cup without Rooney having a good moan in the camera at the end of a game #england #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Raheem Sterling (England) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gary Cahill.

timelineItems.name: Andre Espindola
timelineItems.text: Which was worse: 50 Cent's first pitch or Wayne Rooney's corner? #ENGvITA #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  England. Conceded by Andrea Barzagli.

timelineItems.name: TWJonasForever
timelineItems.text: If England keeps playing like that, they could win this....as long as they keep the defense straight and no openings @MaxTheWanted #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Thunder Tie
timelineItems.text: This is what I imagine is happening: English fans are yelling "WAAYNNEEE ROOONEY!!!" Italian fans are saying "Bobbity boopie." #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Raheem Sterling (England) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Ross Barkley.

timelineItems.name: john xenofontos
timelineItems.text: Only way back is the with some quick football, Italians can handle the slow pace! #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: H
timelineItems.text: Well, at least Uruguay looked beatable. #ENGvITA #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Stacey Louise
timelineItems.text: Italy's defence is too strong #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Maanisaad Shahriar
timelineItems.text: Sorry, I have seen enough. 1998 England squad > 2014 England squad. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.name: Ravi B
timelineItems.text: Do England know there is a left wing as well? They are playing like the left lane is closed for them.no innovation.#ENGvITA #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Older Goaler
timelineItems.text: Couple extra mins for the physio. #ENGvITA #2014WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Italy. Thiago Motta tries a through ball, but Ciro Immobile is caught offside.
Marco Parolo (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Raheem Sterling (England).

timelineItems.name: Galal
timelineItems.text: Chiellini is a professional Bosnian boxer that lost his way into Italy's football dressing room. #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gary Cahill (England).
Thiago Motta (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Paul Williams
timelineItems.text: Brilliant! Could this be any better?!?!? #ENGvITA #wales #bbcworldcup

timelineItems.comment: Andrea Pirlo (Italy) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: H
timelineItems.text: Pirlo will never stop being a set piece God. #ENGvITA #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Rana Malook
timelineItems.text: Lot of hostility towards Rooney tonight.. TBF he's playing out of position. Needs to play central. #WorldCup #ENGvITA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, England 1, Italy 2.
